entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 12:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: E 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
